EmailTemplate.name: Signed By Appraiser Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Signed By Appraiser
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Signed By Appraiser
Dear {!AppraiseeName} ,
Your Appraisal Form is signed by {!AppraiserName} Kindly go through the feedback and comments given by the Appraiser and send the form for Review before {!EndDate} by providing corresponding details.
Thank & Regards,
KRIYA(PMS)
